ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:51:15 [Issue ID 4000-27902] urn:comicvine:4000-27902 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:42:16. [Issue ID 42631]
ComicInfo.Summary: Outcasts!: SHIELD tests Bruce out and discovers that he is not the new Hulk. The Hulkbusters agree to work with SHIELD. Rick heads to the old underground bunker where he and Bruce used to try and contain the Hulk and finds a group of creatures mutated by the gamma bomb. The new Hulk becomes their friend but they ask him to leave after an attack by SHIELD.
